about.title: About
about.description: I'm self-taught and constantly looking for new challenges that allow me to develop profesionally, as well as let me aquire more experience. I consider my self fit to work with teams, because i can adapt to different workteams or workplaces.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Interested in working together? Fill out the form bellow with some info about your project or idea and I will get to you as soon as I can. Please allow a couple days for me to respond.
